item.title: Household items dumped in street, 26th September
item.description:
The constant dumping of household waste ruining the state of the street continues. These items strewn in the street present health and safety isssues as well as making the road an unpleasant environment.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Olinda Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping of stuff that should be picked up by council, 26th September
item.description:
Mattresses and other detritus continues to be left instead of the council being asked to collect. Amongst the detritus there are items which can be recycled but residents are too damn lazy to separate out and put in recycle just 30 secs across Wyndham Road. Its utterly tedious......

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pitman Street, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lamp in council parking lot is not working, 26th September
item.description:
Street lamp in council parking lot is not working For months. Now it is getting winter and nights are longer. There were several burglaries in neighbouring properties already. It is a secluded car park. Can you please fix urgently . Due to darkness the car park sometimes attracts who park and smoke there as it is dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Surrey Terrace, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clissold park locked us in, 26th September
item.description:
My two friends and I were walking home through clissold park at 7.45pm. The park ranger told us it was shutting soon so we headed towards the exit but when we arrived he was locking up. We shouted and waved, he saw us and left. We are all 16 years old
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fountayne Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street lights working, 26th September
item.description:
The street around Kevington drive ie Wimborne avenue, Berens way, Clarendon way, markings park avenue. There are only about 5 or 6 street lights working. This is very dangerous and could incite crime as people won’t be seen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Berens Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
